# Duolingo Clone Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack language learning application with:
- **Backend**: Java Spring Boot with JPA/Hibernate
- **Frontend**: Vue.js 3 with Composition API
- **Database**: PostgreSQL

## Architecture
- RESTful API backend on port 8080
- Vue frontend on port 5173
- PostgreSQL database on port 5432

## Development Guidelines
- Follow REST API conventions
- Use JPA entities for database models
- Implement proper error handling
- Use Vue Composition API for components
- Follow responsive design principles

## Project Status
✅ Project structure created
⏳ In development
